channel.title: Birdnation devolopment team <3
channel.description:
[size=36pt]This is a formationx base source [/size] [size=24pt]Okay welcome to the birdsnation devolopment page im going to run you through on some server feature's I fixed many bug's glitche's ect so please don't rage at me or flame ect[/size]
[size=24pt] The server is running on a VPS as of today not finished yet but i thought i'd realise still need's alot done but i have purchased webhost/domain aswell read on <3[/size]
[size=14pt]firemaking fully spawning root's when woodcutting pest control barrows working duel arena korasi full spec! fishing working wildy + working wildy ditch dark portal with teleport's you to penance queen 508 maps! hit splats with fading effect! working jad! working master cape / veteran cape ! working dragon claws with x4 special ! NO MEM LEAKS, 508 MAPS/OBJECTS, 602 ANIMS/NPCS, 652 ITEMS! fully working godwars! crabs blended in with ground untill approaching exp lock/unlock great pking zone's torva,pernix,primal and more! working skillcape emote's! economy server no spawning ect (unless admin ) all chaotic items e.g chaotic rapier chaotic maul ect pvp armours ! all godswords! working tormented dragons! and much much much more so enough of the feature's where do I apply?[/size]
[size=14pt] Use this format only please preferably skype .. What is your real name: What position are you applying for be spercific: How much experience do you have in this field: Why should we choose you: In less then one line tell us what is special about you: your MSN and Skype: [/size]
[size=18pt] What do we expect from you? To take your job seriously. To do you job for at least 20 hours a week. To act sensibly. To have a skype or Msn account.[/size]
[size=24pt] Programming position's[/size] [size=14pt]java/server coder (0-1) website devoloper must be able to use a domain and webhost not webs.com (0-1) webclient maker/client maker [PI] (0-1) Administrator (0-1) moderator (0-1) [/size]
[size=18pt]I look forward to here from you all <3 [/size]

@Pull_Ups wrote:

What is your real name: Nathan
What position are you applying for be specific: Webmaster/Forum Owner/Community Manager
How much experience do you have in this field: I have had 2 - 3 years of owning different forums and managing communities on RSPS’. I’ve enjoyed every minute of it.
Why should we choose you?: I’m a grammar nazi and extremely professional when it comes down to it.
Skype: natewentworth
MSN (On this more): natewentworth@hotmail.com

item.title: Birdnation devolopment team <3

item.description:
@chicksdigcamo wrote:

                                         [size=36pt]This is a formationx base source [/size]

[size=24pt]Okay welcome to the birdsnation devolopment page im going to run you through on some server feature’s I fixed many bug’s glitche’s ect so please don’t rage at me or flame ect[/size]

[size=24pt] The server is running on a VPS as of today not finished yet but i thought i’d realise still need’s alot done but i have purchased webhost/domain aswell read on <3[/size]

[size=14pt]firemaking
fully spawning root’s when woodcutting
pest control
barrows
working duel arena
korasi full spec!
fishing
working wildy + working wildy ditch
dark portal with teleport’s you to penance queen
508 maps!
hit splats with fading effect!
working jad!
working master cape / veteran cape !
working dragon claws with x4 special !
NO MEM LEAKS, 508 MAPS/OBJECTS, 602 ANIMS/NPCS, 652 ITEMS!
fully working godwars!
crabs blended in with ground untill approaching
exp lock/unlock
great pking zone’s
torva,pernix,primal and more!
working skillcape emote’s!
economy server no spawning ect (unless admin )
all chaotic items e.g chaotic rapier chaotic maul ect
pvp armours !
all godswords!
working tormented dragons!
and much much much more so enough of the feature’s where do I apply?[/size]

[size=14pt] Use this format only please preferably skype …
What is your real name:
What position are you applying for be spercific:
How much experience do you have in this field:
Why should we choose you:
In less then one line tell us what is special about you:
your MSN and Skype:
[/size]

[size=18pt] What do we expect from you?
To take your job seriously.
To do you job for at least 20 hours a week.
To act sensibly.
To have a skype or Msn account.[/size]

[size=24pt] Programming position’s[/size]

website devoloper must be able to use a domain and webhost not webs.com (0-1)
